title: Knight Takes Pawn
description: When an opportunity presents itself, is Natalie willing to do whatever it takes to free herself or remain only a pawn?All resources needed to survive are severely limited, causing many Jaruians to pillage one another just to get a single meal for the day.There are some who wish to end Jagger’s power and they’ve started to infiltrate his organization. Money, amongst other things, are just a farce that Jagger uses to dangle in front of his subjects to keep the population in line and distracted.WARNING: This series contains sensitive material. Reader discretion is advised.
author: Martha Sweeney
